org.taverna.server.master.notification

Class EmailDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.taverna.server.master.notification.RateLimitedDispatcher
      • org.taverna.server.master.notification.EmailDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageDispatcher

    public class EmailDispatcher
extends RateLimitedDispatcher
    How to send a plain text message by email to someone.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of this dispatcher, which must match the protocol supported by it (for a non-universal dispatcher) and the name of the message generator used to produce the message.

      • setFrom

        public void setFrom(String from)
        Parameters:
        from - Email address that the notification is to come from.

      • setSmtpHost

        public void setSmtpHost(String host)
        Parameters:
        host - The outgoing SMTP server address.

      • setMessageContentType

        public void setMessageContentType(String contentType)
        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type of the message to be sent. For example, " text/plain".

      • setSender

        public void setSender(org.springframework.mail.MailSender sender)
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender to set

      • tryLookup

        @PostConstruct
public void tryLookup()
        Try to perform the lookup of the email service. This is called during configuration so that any failure happens at a useful, predictable time.

      • dispatch

        public void dispatch(String messageSubject,
                     String messageContent,
                     String to)
              throws Exception
        Description copied from class: RateLimitedDispatcher
        Dispatch a message to a recipient that doesn't care what produced it.
        Specified by:
        dispatch in class RateLimitedDispatcher
        Parameters:
        messageSubject - The subject of the message to send.
        messageContent - The plain-text content of the message to send.
        to - A description of where it is to go.
        Throws:
        Exception - If anything goes wrong.

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Returns:
        Whether this message dispatcher is actually available (fully configured, etc.)
